OMG I like Dakoda Fanning, but I love Joan Jett.  I had every album she made with the black hearts.  Prolly the first in my gang of boys.  I was 17 when I heard her fell in LOVE. 
I still love ya Jett.  Gonna replace the albums now.   Great movie for fans of the Blackhearts, wish I could give you more +'s at the top of this page.  Thank you

frd420,

Acting is an art form, so the pleasure you take from it is subjective. I can't tell you that Kristen Stewart is a "good" actress, as if that could be a "fact", because it's not, it's just my opinion...but I really thought she did a great job in this movie. I really think you were a little harsh. She's playing a foul mouthed, degenerate rock star. She's supposed to say "fuck" a lot.

Anyone familiar with Joan Jett would concur, I believe. I think Stewart's one of the best talents out there, and I'm pretty hard to please. She really became the character, and if you see her during the release of the films you can see she's still playing the part, like it was hard to shake off. I admire that kind f passion and dedication.

But that's just my 2 cents. 

Thanks for the upload, FXG Team.
